channel.title: News – End World Hunger 2045 – Endworldhunger2045.com
channel.description: End World Hunger 2045 is a foundation dedicated to helping provide those in need with life's basic necessities food, clothing, access to employment.

item.title: Launch of Newsletter
item.dc:creator: fund.ewh2045@gmail.com
item.description:
If you have ever scrolled to the bottom of our front page, you may have noticed a field where you can submit your email to receive a newsletter. If you haven't, well, now you know. Sign up for our newsletter for exclusive updates on our pilgrimage. We will start sending them out this or next [...]

The post Launch of Newsletter appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.
item.content:encoded:
If you have ever scrolled to the bottom of our front page, you may have noticed a field where you can submit your email to receive a newsletter.

If you haven’t, well, now you know.

Sign up for our newsletter for exclusive updates on our pilgrimage. We will start sending them out this or next week.

We are excited about this, we hope you are too!

 

The post Launch of Newsletter appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.

item.title: EWH2045’s Shikoku Pilgrimage
item.dc:creator: fund.ewh2045@gmail.com
item.description:
61 days. 1200 kilometers. 88 temples. Starting on May 9. The Shikoku Pilgrimage is located in Japan. The goal is to visit 88 temples and reflect spiritually. Members of EWH2045 will undertake this journey in May. Our goal is to inform people about our fundraiser, and our organization. We hope to build a school in [...]

The post EWH2045’s Shikoku Pilgrimage appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.
item.content:encoded:
61 days. 1200 kilometers. 88 temples. Starting on May 9.

The Shikoku Pilgrimage is located in Japan. The goal is to visit 88 temples and reflect spiritually.

Members of EWH2045 will undertake this journey in May. Our goal is to inform people about our fundraiser, and our organization. We hope to build a school in Arusha, Tanzania. We also hope to improve the collective spirituality of members of our organization.

You can donate here.

The details about where the fundraised money will go are as follows. All the prices are in CAD.

  • Land cost – $28,000
  • Construction cost (three buildings) – $5,500
  • Site prep – $500
  • Water – $3,000
  • Sewer – $2,000

Total cost is $39,000.

Minna, ganbaro!!

The post EWH2045’s Shikoku Pilgrimage appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.

item.title: New Office in Arusha, Tanzania
item.dc:creator: fund.ewh2045@gmail.com
item.description:
End World Hunger 2045 is delighted to announce the opening of its first office outside Canada. The new office will be located in Arusha, Tanzania and will be operating with help of Shimba. Our organization together with Shimba will be supporting a orphanage of 23 children along with a few people. Shimba is dedicated to [...]

The post New Office in Arusha, Tanzania appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.
item.content:encoded:
End World Hunger 2045 is delighted to announce the opening of its first office outside Canada. The new office will be located in Arusha, Tanzania and will be operating with help of Shimba. Our organization together with Shimba will be supporting a orphanage of 23 children along with a few people. Shimba is dedicated to helping the orphans and is commited even more with our help to make a beautiful place where children can learn and receive missing love from parents. Thank you Shimba, for your dedication from all of us at End World Hunger 2045.

The post New Office in Arusha, Tanzania appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.
